summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2966, for the improvement of 2nd Avenue West, from West Thomas Street to West Republican Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing therein concrete sidewalks with wooden cross walks, etc; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 35750 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
